messages.message:
hey all, a question… so in an apply refiner step in flow editor, there is a grey text `Extra Settings` and if you click on that, it gives you a button to select a folder that is `Refiner Programs Directory` …. from the backend code looks like it runs all refiner programs on a record and concat the extracted fields together… does anyone actually use this feature?? :thinking_face: this is probably a feature from a long time ago…

i’m thinking about changing this for something else. cc @Hari - not sure if SC uses this? also cc @Heymian and @shaunak…. don’t know if you know what this feature was created for…
I think David created this, and yeah I believe the purpose was exactly what you said, to run a bunch of refiners and concat the results
interesting, i wonder if it is because the old refiner gets very slow when there are many fields
